Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the impact of the arts tax by stating that it would provide funding for certified arts and music teachers for every elementary school serving Portland residents. Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or support for the assertion that the arts tax would indeed provide funding for certified arts and music teachers for every elementary school.
